description: It's time to create the "Hard Drives" of Refined Storage. To do this, we'll need a Storage Housing that we'll combine with a Storage Part to create a Storage Disk. Just simply make the desired size of the part, then combine with the housing to create a disk.
The Storage Disk is used to store your items virtually once placed inside of the Disk Drive. It has to be put in a Disk Drive. The Storage Disk wonâ€™t despawn when dropped in the world.
